name: GitHub Pages should check the state of the system before interacting with the UI
title: GitHub Pages should check the state of the system before interacting with the UI

testSteps.description: Apisitt ensures all GitHub systems are operational

children.description: Apisitt sends a GET request to 'https://www.githubstatus.com/api/v2/status.json'

restQuery.requestHeaders:
Accept: application/json, text/plain, */*
User-Agent: axios/1.5.1
Accept-Encoding: gzip, compress, deflate, br
restQuery.responseHeaders:
content-type: application/json; charset=utf-8
transfer-encoding: chunked
connection: close
x-download-options: noopen
x-permitted-cross-domain-policies: none
referrer-policy: strict-origin-when-cross-origin
x-statuspage-version: 249e8fb2728ae9d8f3a7a9e5cb85c3d2f8f8fe83
strict-transport-security: max-age=259200
x-statuspage-skip-logging: true

x-pollinator-metadata-service: status-page-web-pages

x-xss-protection: 1; mode=block
